name: VMware vRealize Automation single node catalog deployment
description: This template will deploy a vRA catalog containing a single server component.

metadata.displayName: This template will deploy a vRA catalog containing a single server component
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a vRA catalog containing a single server component. Connection information derived from catalog properties will be used to execute a remote exec command.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: vRA infrastructure: 1 Catalog and 1 managed node.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. User should update catalog name, input properties, and vRA environment-specific information.
3. The vRA terraform provider information can be found here: https://github.com/vmware/terraform-provider-vra7
